logs.text: Patient has an issue with the toe
The blister is becoming bigger, the cream might be needed
As cream did not help , the patient should go see the dermatologist
Patient smokes 20 cigarettes a day. This may be the reason why he has hard time breathing. The area where he lives is also very polluted - this may be a reason too.
Patient recovered but regular follow up is needed.
Patient has trouble with digestion. This could be an infection in the area.
Patient might need to take special pills to recover.
The situation has improved. A follow up to be ensured tomorrow.
TThis was caused by an infection in the area as multiple other cases of severe diarrhea were recorded.
